name: tidy-type
description: A focused CSS library for tidy typesetting.

scripts.changelog: npm run ensure-clean-repo && npm run changelog:generate && git add Changelog.md && git commit --message='Update the changelog'
scripts.ensure-clean-repo: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then echo 'Ooops-a-daisy! Make sure the repo is clean.'; exit 1; fi
scripts.precommit: gulp build && git add dist; npm run diffy-package && git add package.json
